definition.name: Tabs
definition.purpose: Provides a container for tabbed navigation and content.
definition.description: A wrapper component around Radix UI's TabsPrimitive.Root, used to create a tabbed interface. It applies custom styling and allows for additional class names to be passed in.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the root tabs container.

initial.data: No tabs selected, displays the tab navigation and content area.

when.description: User clicks on a tab trigger.

effects: Tab content area updates to show the selected tab's content

definition.visualLayout: A vertical flex container with a tab navigation bar and a content area.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI TabsPrimitive.Root and applies custom styles using the cn utility.

definition.name: TabsList
definition.purpose: Displays the list of tab triggers for navigation.
definition.description: A wrapper component around Radix UI's TabsPrimitive.List, used to render the navigation bar for tabs. It applies custom styling and allows for additional class names.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the tabs list.

initial.data: Displays all tab triggers for navigation.

definition.visualLayout: An inline-flex container for tab triggers, styled as a navigation bar.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI TabsPrimitive.List and applies custom styles using the cn utility.

definition.name: TabsTrigger
definition.purpose: Acts as a clickable trigger to select a tab.
definition.description: A wrapper component around Radix UI's TabsPrimitive.Trigger, used as the clickable element to select a tab. It applies custom styling and allows for additional class names.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the tab trigger.

effects: The corresponding tab content is displayed

definition.visualLayout: A styled button for tab selection.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI TabsPrimitive.Trigger and applies custom styles using the cn utility.

definition.name: TabsContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content for the currently selected tab.
definition.description: A wrapper component around Radix UI's TabsPrimitive.Content, used to render the content area for the selected tab. It applies custom styling and allows for additional class names.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the tab content area.

initial.data: Displays the content for the selected tab.

effects: The content area updates to show the new tab's content

definition.visualLayout: A flex container for tab content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI TabsPrimitive.Content and applies custom styles using the cn utility.
